title: Prom Night
creator_credit: Simcom Limited, Guardian Trust Company, Prom Night Productions, Peter R. Simpson, William Gray, Paul Lynch and Robert Guza Jr.
brief_description: This slasher movie follows a relentless killer who is out to avenge the death of a young girl who died after being bullied and teased by four of her classmates. Now high-school students, the guilt-ridden kids have kept their involvement a secret, but when they start being murdered, one by one, it’s clear that someone knows the truth. Also coping with the past are members of the dead girl’s family, most notably her prom-queen sister, Kim Hammond (Jamie Lee Curtis).
creator_credit_for_label: Simcom Limited, Guardian Trust Company, Prom Night Productions, Peter R. Simpson, William Gray, Paul Lynch and Robert Guza Jr.
